sentence: She picked a ripe red apple from the tree.
The sunflower turned its face toward the sun.
He typed quickly on the computer keyboard.
The waves crashed on the shore of the vast ocean.
The children were joyful as they played in the park.
She studied astronomy to learn about the stars and planets.
The car accelerated, reaching a high velocity on the highway.
They attended a lively concert featuring their favorite band.
The effervescent drink bubbled in the glass.
The old bookstore was the quintessential place for book lovers.
